# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to avoid production stoppages.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electricity network to generate power.
- Verify that pipe groups are properly connected to boilers and offshore pumps to transport fluids.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients or source items
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to process.
- Verify that burner inserters have source items to transport.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network to supply power to entities.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables were found in the provided execution logs.
